Nighlight::

Nighlight said with sadness "I'm afraid that I couldn't help... My 
memories had been erased, I just remember when I woke up in Preds 
lab...I jsut can remember few things more when I met Rodimus and 
when we fell in love with him... after that it's in blank "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> Denzabar stared with a puzzled look on his face. " Can we sit and 
you tell me 
> about it. I am afraid the ONLY memories I retain are that of the 
past three 
> days. Up until today I couldn't talk. Up until three days ago I 
thought I 
> was...of this planet."
